content: open PDF in files tap on pages indicator (top left) tap on page after which you want to add pages (or which you want to remove) “insert from file” (“delete”) (select files) “done” Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Here is a link to the video instead.
title: Basic PDF page editing on iOS

/Users/USERNAME/Library/Services/Run Activity Monitor.workflow

title: Hotkey for Activity Monitor on MacOS
